title: Beautiful Home in
posting_body: Beautiful custom home in the coveted Coventry subdivision in Littleton, CO available immediately for a long-term rental opportunity.
5 bdrm, 2.5 bath, main level primary with en-suite bath, hardwood floors, finished basement, mature landscaping with private backyard, 3 car garage, quiet cul-de-sac location.
LPS schools (Wilder Elementary, Goddard Middle School, Heritage High School).
Gated community offering swimming pools and tennis courts.
